name: bookish
description: A simple platform for creating readable, accessible online books.

scripts.build-assets: cp src/style/* public/; cp -r src/images public/; cp src/index.html public/
scripts.build-scripts-prod: node ./esbuild.js prod; terser public/bookish.js -m -c -o public/bookish.js; terser public/app.js -m -c -o public/app.js;
scripts.build-dev: npm run test; npm run build-clean; npm run build-assets; npm run build-scripts-dev
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-clean; npm run build-assets; npm run build-scripts-prod
